pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with a close-up view of a ground covered in small, glittering particles, with a building, a utility pole, and a tree in the background. As the camera moves upward, more of the surroundings become visible, including additional trees and a water tower in the distance. The scene remains consistent with the building, utility pole, and tree in the foreground, while the background reveals more details of the landscape, including a shed and additional structures.
